title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=c66e9dcd0a8a95af64278007680175e959e0098c
comments: I am listening to bhajans and classic Odia songs. I sometime listen to BTS because their songs are catchy.
I was thinking BTS & bhajans had similarities & then i completed reading the sentence.

भ्राताश्री, हम सत्संग सुनते हैं।

भाईजान, हम ग़ज़ल भी सुनते हैं।।
BTS
Arijit Singh ,Shreya Ghoshal ,Atif Aslam ,KK ,some clash royale background music ,coke studio ,and little bit Taylor Swift
Been listening to a lot of Linkin Park and Metallica lately. Any good rock/ heavy metal suggestions?
AC DC
Poets of the fall, Imagine Dragons
Rage against the machine.
If you like rock listen to Iron maiden track - fear of the dark  and redhotchillipeppers Californian
Playing [this](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3NFXzELB7vLcvciTqLuy2L?si=xgQYvt1XTqiyaHbNeGGdIw) on repeat these days!
he asked metal not a clusterfuck of sounds made from a laptop
listen to megadeth asap , especially rust in peace

For Linkin park - soad, deftones, korn, Evanescence, alterbridge
 
For Metallica - pantera, Megadeth, testament,

Black Sabbath if you need heavy riffs. For more modern stuff I would definitely suggest Bring me the Horizon, Bullet for my valentine and Bad Omens. You might even try Asking Alexandria and Avenged Sevenfold.

If you like Metallica you'll surely love Iron Maiden (I have been listening to Somewhere in time recently on repeat) , you can also try Black Sabbath Paranoid ,Pantera , Led Zepplin-IV/Physical Graffiti ;if you want to listen to milder rock try Boston or The Who.

Heard a piece of this ghazal in some Insta reels, and I looked it up on internet and since then this ghazal has been my earworm.

Pyar ka pehla khat by Jagjit Singh

https://youtu.be/f1R8rokg8Lg
[https://readmytechtips.com/joinpd-com/](https://readmytechtips.com/joinpd-com/)
Tere pyar mein from Tu Jhoothi Main Makkar https://music.apple.com/in/album/tere-pyaar-mein-from-tu-jhoothi-main-makkaar/1669177014?i=1669177015

Hi! I'm hoping someone can help me. I was just eating at an Indian restaurant in America and was transfixed by a music video that was playing on MTV India -- but I couldn't tell who the singer was or the song that was playing. 

The show said it was a "trendsetter" so I'm guessing it was a newer video. It was a female singer. There were lots of quick cuts, it felt like a movie, and didn't really ever show her singing, but with some dancing. Some of the moments I remember were three men holding guns and then opening a door to hundreds of men holding knives, and the men with guns getting scared. Later, there was a leader of a city and everyone was wearing paper masks of that leader's face. 

If anyone has any idea what this was, I'd love to watch it again! Thank you so much!
can you recommend some odia songs that you like?
The whole album of Almost Pyaar with DJ Mohabbat is too good
Nahin Saamne Tu by AR Rahman is the most beautiful song that I've heard this year
Inxs and daft punk

There is this song I heard on 93.5 and I can’t find it anywhere.
It goes like: “haan, mai sochta hu, tere hi bare main
Aksar jagta hai tu, mere hi khwaab main”
(It’s an independent song)
Thanks a lot
Any playlist for running motivation?
I love that this seems like a question I would have posted some 15-16 years ago. Keep exploring and have fun.

Hey guys!

As a performing musician, it can be pretty hard to find dependable employers & secure transactions, and promote your art in India. It’s a problem I'm trying to solve, and I need your help. 

If you're a musician/someone looking for gigs, please fill out the survey using the link below so we can understand the exact nature of the issues you face while finding & booking shows. It’ll just take 5 mins if your time :) 

[https://forms.gle/ZRJ3x4Sh9wS393wa9](https://forms.gle/ZRJ3x4Sh9wS393wa9)

Whether you’re looking for gigs or just a quick jam session with like-minded individuals, we could work towards coming up with a solution for your needs. If you know others that this is relevant to, do share the link, and thank you for your help!
the album, like an everflowing stream
Checkout Pantera, Gojira, Tool, Lamb of God, Accept, Iron Maiden, Megadeth. Testament. These are some of good entry level bands that can hook you up to metal.

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLT2aRgQ2luCeAPTEqNUKVkwDfjikcMhyw

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLT2aRgQ2luCdgLZ0kuf_0Jkl-8CNCUC0R

Recently discovered these two playlist. If you are fan of folk and some soulful music. Totally orgasm for ears.
Definitely System of a Down

What is the name of this song?
I have some lyrics but not able to find the song..

Not able to post it in reddit..
Posted song here

https://imgur.com/gallery/QCyl7T0
Arijit Singh's rise has been helped by Bollywood deciding to not give opportunities to Rahat Ali Khan and Atif Aslam
Rùfùs Du Sol
[Aao Raja](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=66VN2ZIWPnw), most likely.
Wow - yes! This is it, thank you so much.
Any upcoming concerts in mumbai for this year?
